trans-unit.source: Derivative of <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.DependencyObjectValidator"></xref> that is a base class for all activity validator components.
trans-unit.target: 파생 <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.DependencyObjectValidator"> </xref> 모든 활동 유효성 검사기 구성 요소에 대 한 기본 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ActivityValidator"></xref> class.
Verifies that the given activity is valid.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 활동이 유효한 지 확인 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method calls <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator.ValidateProperties%2A> to validate the properties of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>.

This method only validates the uniqueness of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A> for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> if the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> is not a root <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>.
trans-unit.target: 고유성 유효성만 검사 하는이 메서드는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A>에 대 한는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>경우 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>는 루트 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> 은</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection"></xref> object that contains any errors or warnings that occurred during validation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection"> </xref> 오류 또는 유효성 검사 중 발생 한 경고를 포함 하는 개체입니다.
